chunk:
Skin Owl Tomato Beauty Bar (2018 formulation)

Brand: Skin

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Solanum lycopersicum (Tomato) juice, Saponified Olea europaea (Olive) Oil, Unrefined Organic Vitellaria Paradoxa (Shea) Butter, Unrefined Organic Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, GMO-free Ricinus communis (Castor) Oil, GMO-free Melaleuca alternif

e Melaleuca alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, GMO-free Lavendula dentate (Lavender) Oil, GMO-free Litsea cubeba (May Chang) Oil, Bentonite clay

Directions: Soak bar under warm water and apply lather onto entire face. Rinse and pat face dry. Can be used morning and night as a daily face cleanser.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; M
& Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
